lcInstruction.p: The <learningAssessment> topic type contains exercises, quizzes, or tests. This information can be included before learning content as a preliminary test, or after content to re-enforce content or assess understanding.

The assessment type includes several interaction types that you can use to present questions. The interaction types include true-false, multiple-choice, open question, matching, sequence, and hot-spot (which allows the student to click on the designated area of an image). If these questions are meant for an interactive e-learning environment, it will require a specific output type as well as a learning management system (LMS).

The main body element is the <learningAssessmentbody> which can include <lcIntro>, <lcObjectives>, <lcDuration>, <lcInteraction>, <section>, and <lcSummary> elements. Questions types are included in the <lcInteraction> element.
